refnamediv.refpurpose: returns a smallest fragment of persistent XML entity object ('XPER entity') such that it contains some range of words in its text

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This receives the XML entity and returns its fragment or signals an error.

refsect2.title: entity
refsect2.para: A 'persistent XML' entity to be searched

refsect2.title: starting_word
refsect2.para: The number of the leftmost word which should be in the selected fragment

refsect2.title: ending_word
refsect2.para: The number of the rightmost word which should be in the selected fragment
